tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 11-45 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament (exempt to second reshuffle)
tourBios.carHigh: Has competed on the NGA Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was four-time all-county golfer in high school...Also played hockey for two years...Was a two-time Atlantic Coast Conference All-Academic team member at Florida State.
tourBios.personal: Attended H.B. Plant High School in Tampa, Fla...If not a professional golfer, would be an economist...Biggest thrill outside golf is skydiving...Favorite course played was Olympia Fields outside Chicago...Favorite pro team is Tampa Bay Buccaneers...Favorite TV Show is "Suits" and favorite movie is "Batman."...Favorite entertainer is Eminem, and his favorite athlete is Kobe Bryant...Top spots to visit are Chicago and the Florida Keys...Dream foursome would be Eminem, Tiger Woods and LeBron James...Not many people know he can do a backflip...First-tee introduction song would be "Lose Yourself" by Eminem.

tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Finished T31 at the Florida Qualifying Tournament on the strength of four under-par rounds, including three scores of 69.
tourBios.personal: Loves water sports...Uses a lucky charm ball marker...Favorite sports team is the Tampa Bay Lightning...Olympia Fields is favorite course he's played and hopes to play Augusta National one day.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour in 2016 is T26th at the El Bosque Mexico Championship presented by INNOVA.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 28th in Driving Distance on the Web.com Tour.
